topic.title: Submit a request to sell plugins through JetBrains Marketplace
topic.p: Please submit a request via the Apply to JetBrains Marketplace form, and our vendor success team will get in touch with you.

The process of setting up a new paid plugin on JetBrains Marketplace is not fully automated and requires assistance from the JetBrains team. If you encounter any issues with submitting the request, feel free to contact us at marketplace@jetbrains.com.
